lead_paragraph: ROSEN--Sara. The American Jewish Congress is deeply saddened by the death yesterday at 99 of the mother of our President, Jack Rosen, and his late brother, Joseph. Devoted wife of the late David, Sarah was the proud grandmother of five and great-grandma of 12 and a woman of spirit and courage. Our thoughts are with Jack and his family. Services Today at 10am, at Riverside Memorial Chapel, 76th St., and Amsterdam Ave. 1/3
